# [Interview #718: Alloy of Law Signing Report - FireArcadia, Entry #2](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=718#2)

#### Fire Arcadia

Are there 50 Allomantic Metals?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Nearly. Does Harmony have a metal?

#### FIRE ARCADIA

Is that an alloy of Lerasium and Atium?

#### BRANDON SANDERSON

You're along the right lines.
